roleset.name: marry
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to cuddle.01. Cuddle.01 is a member of VN class marry-36.2. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Use arg 2 when it is clear the speaker is the first cuddler (ie for 'with' PPs)
example.text: The APAP hinders cuddling with her husband
